initialize

public static void initialize(java.lang.String localeName,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> resourcePaths,
                              ILog logger)
Initialize the app context once a the start of a program

Parameters:
localeName - name of the locale to use (ENGLISH, GERMAN, etc)
resourcePaths - locations of the properties file in the classpath pointing to message bundles
logger - logging implementation
